name: Speechify
description: Speechify is a text-to-speech platform that converts text into natural-sounding audio for enhanced accessibility and productivity.
longDescription: Speechify is a text-to-speech application designed to help users listen to written content, making it easier for people with dyslexia, visual impairments, or busy schedules to consume information. Founded by Cliff Weitzman, the platform aims to improve accessibility and productivity by transforming text from books, articles, PDFs, and websites into high-quality audio. It supports multiple languages and offers customizable voice options to suit user preferences. Speechify is widely used by students, professionals, and individuals with learning disabilities to streamline reading and learning processes. The platform integrates with various devices and applications, ensuring seamless access to content on the go. Its mission is to empower users to overcome reading barriers and enhance comprehension through auditory learning.
features: Converts text from PDFs, emails, and websites into natural-sounding audio for easy listening.
Offers a variety of high-quality, customizable voices to match user preferences and needs.
Supports over 30 languages, enabling global accessibility for diverse users.
Integrates with mobile apps and browser extensions for seamless cross-platform use.
Provides adjustable reading speeds to optimize comprehension and time efficiency.
Includes OCR technology to extract and read text from scanned documents or images.
Allows users to upload and listen to entire books or documents in one go.
Offers a highlighting feature that syncs text with audio to aid visual tracking.
Provides cloud-based storage for saving and accessing audio files across devices.
Includes a dyslexia-friendly interface to support users with learning disabilities.
Enables offline listening for audio files downloaded in advance.
Integrates with platforms like Google Drive and Kindle for direct content import.
Offers a free plan with limited features to make the tool accessible to all users.

faqs.question: What is Speechify used for?
faqs.answer: Speechify converts text into audio, helping users listen to books, articles, or documents, especially those with reading difficulties or busy schedules.

faqs.question: Is Speechify free to use?
faqs.answer: Speechify offers a free plan with basic features, while premium plans unlock advanced functionalities like faster speeds and more voices.

faqs.question: Can Speechify read any type of document?
faqs.answer: Yes, Speechify can read PDFs, Word documents, web pages, and scanned images using OCR technology to extract text.

faqs.question: Does Speechify support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Speechify supports over 30 languages, making it accessible to users worldwide.

faqs.question: Is Speechify helpful for people with dyslexia?
faqs.answer: Yes, Speechify’s audio and text-highlighting features are designed to assist users with dyslexia and other reading challenges.

faqs.question: Can I use Speechify offline?
faqs.answer: Speechify allows offline listening for content downloaded in advance, depending on the plan.

faqs.question: Does Speechify integrate with other platforms?
faqs.answer: Speechify integrates with Google Drive, Kindle, and other platforms for seamless content import.

faqs.question: How does Speechify’s text highlighting work?
faqs.answer: Speechify highlights text as it reads aloud, helping users follow along visually to improve focus and comprehension.
